This shirt was perfect for daughter! She's really into the 90s/00s right now and in particular, emo fashion. She loves this shirt. It fits true to size and is just the right amount of baggy for her.
It was bathing suit material, which I thought was unfortunate, but it was very comfy and didn’t smell. The design was nice as well!
5,0 came as shown graphic came as shown with the design sizing is correct held up in was is comfortable priced well would recommend
This shirt is super cute. The material is a little thin. Go one size bigger than you normally would, it runs a little smaller.
I got this to add to my golf wardrobe. It is oversized but not overly oversized, if that makes sense. I do like that it has a two layered look to it. It is soft and comfortable.

Nice graphic top. I’m pleasantly surprised at the quality especially at the price value. I feel it’s worth it. The fabric has a lot of stretch and it’s not too thin. The craftsmanship is good as well. The graphic print is well done. There’s no broken seams or loose thread. I also like the layered long sleeves look. The sleeves are attached. The fit is as expected and comfortable. I ordered my normal size in clothing. The size chart is reliable as well. Overall great top for lounging or casual outings. I have no complaints. It’s a good purchase.
Cute loose fitting shirt that’s super soft
It seems to fit a little small and its a bit shorter than it looks in the picture. Its a cute shirt and a fun design. Its thin but a cute style.
